name: Save Yourself (SSJAbatron)
description:
The World is in Ruins!!! Mike is stranded and has to find a way to reach a shelter far far away!!

Can Mike face the challenges ahead??

Controls -

Up - jump

Left - move left

Right - move right

Enter - move to next level when reaching the exit door.

Mechanics - Ledge Grab to grab ledges/edges while jumping.
